name: Oscar Castillo
body:
### EDUCATION: CALIFORNIA STATE UNIVERSITY, SAN BERNARDINO Candidate for Bachelor of Science In Computer Science Summer 2017 Major Courses:

• Biology

• Computer Architecture

• Computer Sciences

• Chemistry

• Data structures

• Digital Logic

• Electronics

• Machine Organization

• Multi-variable Calculus

• Physics I-III for Engineer

• Operating Systems: Linux and Windows

• Programing Languages: C++ and Verilog

Certificate in Computer Systems and Programming from College of Natural Science Dean’s List: Winter 2012, Spring 2013 ### Qualification Summary:

• Robust skills in organizing workflow

• Punctual, fast learner, team player, team leader

• Aptitude to identify, analyze and solve problems

• Enthusiastic, dependable, self-motivated

• Educated in computers learns new software quickly

• Works well under pressure to meet deadlines

• Microsoft Office, Word press, HTML

### Experience: Foundation Laboratory (Referral Dept. Lead) July 2013 - Present

• Electronic Medical Records Software (EMR)

• Troubleshoot Medical Laboratory Software

• Managed all duties within the Department

• Accept medical test results via EMR

• Organization/Record keeping

• Assist with new test validations

• Memorization of over 100 different medical test and requirements

• Continuous use of problem-solving skill

• Process specimens, check insurances

• Build new test in Data base

• Software programs (Copia/Harvest)

Foundation Laboratory (Data Entry/Processing) July 2012- July 2013

• Enter patient info into Data Base

• Processes specimens

• Check for patients insurance

• Enter 150-200 specimen per night

### Authors >This webpage contains information on @oscar-castle. For more details please click on the link @oscar-castle.< ### Support or Contact Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
